channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Millionaire tax plans spread as Washington state eyes new levy
item.description: Democrats across the US are increasingly exploring taxes as a way to capture the populist moment and address the country’s widening wealth gap.

item.title: This millennial home designer spent 9 months building a replica of ‘The Holiday’ cottage—now it’s renting fast at $499 a night
item.description: Lucy Small, a Georgia-based home designer, had 4,000 fans lined up to rent her festive cottage years before it hit the market. She says the home is so...

item.title: Tesla faces NHTSA probe over Model 3 emergency door handles
item.description: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said it’s evaluating claims that the mechanical door release “is hidden, unlabeled, and not intuiti...

item.title: Obama’s former top economic advisor says he feels ‘a tiny bit bad’ for Trump because gas prices are low, but consumer confidence is still plummeting
item.description: “Consumers are just in this, whatever the highest price is, is the price they're going to focus on,” Harvard professor Jason Furman said.

item.title: GDP data confirms the Gen Z nightmare: the era of jobless growth is here
item.description: "I've never seen anything like it," KPMG's chief economist Diane Swonk told Fortune.

item.title: S&P 500 closes at fresh record high in holiday-shortened session
Crypto investors got almost everything they wanted in 2025. Prices still fell.
With 20 minutes left to trade, the S&P 500 looks to close at an all-time high
Investors' real gift from Wall Street comes the day after Christmas
S&P 500 hits record high on Christmas Eve for first time in more than a decade
